page.title: 13EDUCATION - School aims 2.
page.content: {To provide}for the development of skills in speech, reading, writing, mathematics and science to enable children to make full use of their next stage in education, and of their position in an increasingly technological society. {To provide}basic knowledge of the geography and history of our world, and to encourage skills which will enable all kinds of printed and recorded material to be used to satisfy interests and curiosity in the world. {To develop}and awaken an aesthetic awareness and encourage manipulative skills in art, craft and music. {To develop}physical co-ordination and agility, promoting an interest in games and swimming.
